title: ATS-Optimized Resume Formatting
desc: Ensure your resume passes ATS filters with keyword-focused content, structured layouts, and proper formatting, increasing visibility and shortlisting chances with recruiters.

title: Professional Resume Formatting
desc: Create polished, clean resumes with standardized fonts, layouts, and alignment, presenting achievements clearly and making a strong professional impression.

title: Resume Data Capture
desc: Extract, organize, and structure work history, education, and skills into consistent, professional templates for a seamless and impactful presentation to recruiters.

title: Industry-Specific Resume Formatting
desc: Design resumes tailored to industry standards across IT, healthcare, finance, and creative sectors, ensuring relevance and maximum appeal to recruiters in your field.

title: Bulk Resume Formatting for Recruiters & Enterprises
desc: Standardize hundreds or thousands of resumes for staffing firms, job portals, and HR departments, ensuring consistency, professionalism, and quick processing.
